price: 11. Telle est la création d’Allah, montrez-moi donc ce qu’ont créé ceux (que vous adorez) en dehors de Lui ? Or les injustes sont dans un égarement manifeste.
arabic: هَٰذَا خَلۡقُ ٱللَّهِ فَأَرُونِي مَاذَا خَلَقَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن دُونِهِۦۚ بَلِ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: hādhā khalqu al-lahi fa-arūnī mādhā khalaqa alladhīna min dūnihi bali al-ẓālimūna fī ḍalālin mubīnin
